summary: Non-replacer warpaints for your female characters. Requires RaceMenu.
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE UNINSTALL LT_WARPAINTS_F_PACK01 FIRST! FOLDER PATHS AND ESP CHANGED!

Requirements
============
RaceMenu (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624)
SKSE (http://skse.silverlock.org/)

Description
===========
 Non-replacer warpaints for your female characters. All are 1024x1024 w/mipmaps.
 
  -Tribal
  -Freckles
  -Makeup (Coming Soon!)
  
 
NMM Install (PREFERRED)
=======================
 1. Use NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) to download pack(s) of your choice.
 2. Activate mod.
 3. Use SKSE (Skyrim Script Extender) Launcher to start up Skyrim.
 4. Create some characters!
 
Manual Install
==============
 1. Download pack(s) of your choice.
 2. Extract to your Skyrim directory. (The area that contains your SKSE launcher, original Skyrim launcher...etc)
 3. Overwrite/merge any and all files/folders if prompted.
 4. Tick off LT_Warpaints_PackType.esp
 5. Use SKSE (Skyrim Script Extender) to start up Skyrim.
 6. Create some characters!
 
NMM Uninstall
=============
1. Highlight my mod.
2. Either Deactivate or Delete my mod.

Manual Uninstall
================
 Delete these files:
    Data/LT_Warpaints_F_PackType.bsa
    Data/LT_Warpaints_F_PackType.esp
    Data/LT_WarpaintPreview/Female/PackType
    Data/LT_Warpaints_F_Readme.rtf

Incompatibility
===============
 No incompatibilities as I use custom paths and names to create my warpaints. The only things that need to be overwritten/merged are my own files.
 
Contact
=======
 PM me here on Skyrim.Nexusmods.com.
 
Credits
=======
 Thanks to:
 
  Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
  Skyrim.Nexusmods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
  LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
  Expired6978 for making the wonderful RaceMenu mod.
  SKSE for making the RaceMenu mod (and many others) possible.
  Adobe for making Photoshop.
  RedHeadStock of DeviantArt.com for some of the tribal designs.
  FxSanyi of DevianrtArt.com for some of the tribal designs.
 
Tools Used
==========
 Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
 Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Permissions
==========
 You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod except for RaceMenuBase.PEX and RaceMenuLoad.PEX. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you like with this mod, as long as you credit me, RedHeadStock, and FxSanyi. (Visit their DeviantArt profiles to get more specifics about their permissions.)
author: little_terd
